summary: The core test suite validates essential utilities of the project, including geometric bounding‑box operations, class‑mapping construction and retrieval, and command input/output definition handling. It checks creation from various inputs, attribute calculations, spatial transformations, copying, equality, optional color data, category indices, automatic addition of missing definitions, and robust error handling.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of core components by providing comprehensive regression tests that catch defects early, maintain software quality, and support stable releases of the application.
